COMMENT  
 
He is a marketing passion eer, a mission or iented marketing & communications leader with over +10yrs 
of exper ience & track record in brand management, integrated marketing, & communications   
 
A human centric empath, who flourishes both as a team leader & a team player, finding inclusion in 
diversity, opportunity in challenges, agility in uncertainty.  
 
A passion eer with a mission to add value to everything, values learning & adaptability, with  an attitude 
of curious creativity & who values most of all relationships anchored on trust . 
 
Achievements  
• 1 Million dollar race champion - strategy and launch for the Opco  
• Mobile money rebrand for the MENA region  
• African Cristal Awards ( Silver award ) for  creativity

• Negotiation  
• Problem -solving and decision making  
• Budgeting and cost analysis experience  
• Knowledgeable on principles, practices and techniques of marke ting strategies.  
• Knowledge of social media platforms  
• Multicultural experience and understanding
